website_summaries.verdict: A highly rated green alternative. Plant-based and non-toxic, it cleans as effectively as chemical cleaners without leaving an irritating scent.
pros: Exceeds expectations of odor and stain removal for a green cleaner
Users with fragrance sensitivity enjoy the light, fresh scent
Non-harmful and safe for pets and children
cons: Higher price point but a little goes a long way
We recommend using less concentrate than indicated when using a carpet cleaner because this product tends to foam amply

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product !
customer_reviews.text: We used this product to clean my parents carpet that was put in 10 months ago. My my was itching all over her body with major skin reactions from the new carpet . Once the carpet was cleaned with this organic natural properties, her itching stopped the same day! My mom has been so Much more comfortable since . And it smells fresh & clean! Highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Bissell carpet and upholstery cleaner and I used Puracy cleaning solution instead of the Bissell one that it came with. I'm happy to report it worked well removing the stains from my carpet, mattress, and upholstery! It also doesn't leave a chemical smell and I feel better about the ingredients in the Puracy product for my family's health and the environment. Glad I bought it and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kid safe cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cleaner! Not only is it non-toxic and safe around kids, it also cleaned the carpet beautifully! The scent is nice and light not chemically at all. Also, a little goes a long way, I cleaned a 5x7 rug with only about 4 cap fulls of cleaner. I did it by hand with a brush and wet rag so it took a bit of elbow grease but it was definitely worth the work :)
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product will order again
customer_reviews.text: I previously have been cleaning my carpets with vinegar and this stuff definitely works better. It might take a couple runs to get my carpet looking really good but to be fair my carpet is really really dirty. The carpet shampoo appears to do a good job of sucking up dirt as the water is really really dark despite me just cleaning the carpet frequently and several weeks prior to using this product for the first time. Glad I ordered this product will order again in the future. Does not have a strong scent and I find that nice as I do not like the strong smells of carpet cleaning solutions
customer_reviews.author: Cat treat

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn’t take any before pictures, but to give you an idea as to what the rug was looking like, I have a 5 year old dog and added a 60lb 6 month old puppy last week. It’s been rainy and there’s red clay in the backyard. Between the mud and wet dog smell, the rug had seen better days.... this product got the smell and stains out in one treatment. The smell isn’t overpowering(I added some lemon essential oil to make it stronger) and the product works GREAT! I used about 1/3 of the bottle(didn’t realize that i was supposed to dilute it) and I will definitely be reordering so that I always have it on hand....
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: This product indirectly kills orangutans
customer_reviews.text: This product uses palm oil derivatives, and the harvesting of palm oil is decimating the rain forest and is killing orangutans. Educate yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well on the arms of office chair even at 1:100 dilution
customer_reviews.text: I have an office chair with lightly colored fabric on the arms that tends to get dirty with use. Even heavily diluted this solution easily cleaned it right up. My only issue is that with the recommended 1:100 dilution, it only took a cap-ful mixed with water so the whole bottle is extremely over sized even for a few dozen uses. They should probably sell in a smaller bottle option, but this is kind of like complaining that it works too well...
customer_reviews.author: ERIC L

customer_reviews.title: Better than Kirby shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I used this instead of the Kirby shampoo when I did my carpets recently. I try to avoid chemicals and was very please with how little I had to use! When I use an entire bottle of Kirby shampoo, I only used a very small amount of this one. It also did not foam up so much like Kirby and leave residue. My carpets were so so soft and fluffy after!! Will continue to use and look into other products they have. Great small company!!
customer_reviews.author: Travlbug

customer_reviews.title: Cleans good
customer_reviews.text: I used with hand application for two carpet runners. I was afraid that using a machine would try to suck them around, so I laid them on the patio and scrubbed the solution in with a very wet brush. I let the solution soak in for 30 minutes and then hung them over the fence and sprayed the hose on them. They look so much cleaner and brighter, but still had dog smell somewhat. I then sprinkled the vacuum up type deodorizer on them to help correct that. I think the machine application would work better if you have one. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lehrman

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how concentrated it could be with water listed as the first ingredient. I’ve been disappointed with the carpet cleaning solutions from the store. I added 1 tablespoon to the tank along with my standard Bissel cleaning solution mix. It seemed to help. I could see where adding more product would cause a major sudsing issue. It seemed to boost the clean power. I Only gave it 4 stars because it is NOT a “No rinse” formula. The directions say to follow up with a clean water rinse. You really have to rinse it or the carpet does feels off.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Knowlden

customer_reviews.title: Even my husband loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is our new first choice for our carpet cleaning machine. It does a fantastic job and it's safe for our 2 year old. Our broom closet no longer smells like that chemical Bissel junk and that makes me happy too because I hate the smell. I'm fortunate enough to have a husband that takes care of our floors and our place is almost all carpet to carpet. He's hard to convert to natural cleaning but he loves this stuff too! He was telling me how he was cleaning the Bissel crap out of our rug with it. I'm impressed. #1 in our household. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective, and great value
customer_reviews.text: Got a dirt patch out of the carpet well, with less elbow grease than I’d anticipated. I love that it’s formulas are safe for households with pets and children which is such a piece of mind as many of the oopsies that necessitates carpet cleaning products are a result of pets and children doing their thing! As an added bonus, instructions say to dilute 1oz of product to 100oz of water, so this will last awhile and great value for my money!
customer_reviews.author: Calimari

customer_reviews.title: result is so good without harming animals & nature & me.
customer_reviews.text: incredible! so effective cleaning my fabric couch.. my kitty peed on it multiple times when someone was taking care of him due to stress i guess. before this, i sprayed enzymes to have them eat up the stuff but it still had black marks on. i mixed 2 caps full in 16 oz warm water. used a soft white sponge to clean the surface. when dried my couch looked like new. i'm so happy the result is so good without harming the animals & nature & me.
customer_reviews.author: animal liberation

customer_reviews.title: If your pets have skin problems you should probably use this
customer_reviews.text: This is a sudsy cleaner so use just a little. I had to do a do-over rinse after using it. I had changed my vacuum hose and that may have accounted for the water not being as dark as it was with a Bissell cleaner -- the water was not as dirty/dark as it usually is with Bissell's cleaner. A lot of foam still came up on the second rinse cleaning with plain hot water. This is a great product if your pets have skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: bargainhuntress

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product! I have three elderly dogs who don't always ask to go out and a beige carpet. As you can imagine not a good combo. However, I used this in my Hoover carpet cleaner and was amazed by the outcome. My carpets look brand new and with no harmful chemicals, I am confident that my dogs will not be harmed. I also use the Stain Remover by Puracy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan

customer_reviews.title: Professional results.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional carpet cleaner this product works. However we use it as a pre-spray. It will last alot longer using it this way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dixon

customer_reviews.title: It works, and does not smell
customer_reviews.text: This product works! I bought this because it's supposed to be pet and child safe, which was my biggest concern. I don't know why other people say there's a lot of suds, I had zero. However, I only used a third of the recommended amount because I only anticipated doing a small section at a time due to a bad back. It worked perfect with less than recommended. The pics are only one pass with my Hoover carpet cleaner. I did not spot treat or put anything on the spots. It looks like 2 totally different rugs. Also, there is zero smell.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wilmer-Chero

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on cat pee but seemed decent over all
customer_reviews.text: I mainly purchased this because our cat had a few accidents in our living room and I wanted to use something non toxic around my toddler. This did not work on the cat pee at all but it seemed decent for everything else. It has a nice pleasant citrus scent that did not linger or seem overly strong. Another downside is that this is also supposed to be rinsed from the carpet so it was double the work.
customer_reviews.author: Rozalin

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and cleaning power!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many puracy products and have loved every purchase. Used in my bissel carpet cleaner and it cleans much better than the Bissel and Hoover formulas I have used in the past and it makes me feel better knowing I am not putting harsh chemicals into my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Tara wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We used this to clean sharpie ink stains from our carpet as well as the carpet in our car (which hasn't been cleaned in about 10 years). It was able to remove all the sharpie ink stains and the majority of the dirty spots in our car. Excellent product, non-toxic, and doesn't leave a horrible chemical smell afterwards. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jollie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product all around
customer_reviews.text: LOVE everything about it. I also love lists so... - minimal scent which I love. I don’t need everything in my house to have an odor. Plus, smells irritate my migraines - safe ingredients for pets and humans - label art is done by local (to seller) artist - cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie McLean

customer_reviews.title: Really works great with no smell or residue
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any chemical carpet cleaner and it is non toxic. Put a tablespoon in a bucket and fill with water...get a brush and quickly brush carpets while also putting liquids deep into carpet. Vacuum up water and soap. Spray carpets with a thorough mist of water and vacuum one more time. Good as new with no smell or residue.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has an amazing scent and cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Has an amazing scent and cleans great, I don't have to worry about the little kids playing on my carpet and the amount of junk it got up was more than what mycame with. I will only buy this product for my carpets now.
customer_reviews.author: Loeyd

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Worked GREAT for spot removal! Will never buy any other carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Best Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. Better than the toxic brands. And I have used it on some nasty stains! I use it in my Hoover Carpet Cleaner. My carpets have never looked so good and I don't have to worry about the chemicals my family is breathing in afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Cleans stains
customer_reviews.text: Has a slight citrus scent that quickly dissipates and has not touched my sensitive allergies/asthma AT ALL.I have been using it with a sponge and water to eliminate puppy and high traffic stains. I still haven’t used it for my carpet shampooer.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This does the job! My fiancé had dark stains on his carpet for years! I used it once and it looks a ton better! I am waiting on my professional scrubbers to come in Saturday so i just used a regular sponge on this. I’m sure it will be much better when the scrubbers get here! Buy this product, it WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: KeelyAmourDesigns

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to know this is organic (at least we are trusting the label!). It certainly doesn't have that chemical smell when using it. However, we need to be honest - it just doesn't clean as well as the chemical poison stuff. I said "as well" though as it still cleans. It is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: More sudsy than shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Diluted properly, this product makes carpet cleaning a nightmare. In order toget all the suds out, you must rinse & rinse. It took 8 hours to do one room. Between all the hot water needed, the electricity to run your machine, & the time you spend, it does not seem to be actually better for the environment. I was very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite carpet cleaning solution. It works better than anything else I’ve tried for removing stains and pet odors. I use it in my Hoover carpet cleaner without issue. It has a separate detergent compartment so I dilute it 4 parts water to one part Puracy cleaner per the manufacturer. It smells nice, but the smell is very light and goes away quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It works and with no odor!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. Used it in my Bissell-- all of the cleaning power I would hope for with no unpleasant chemical oder. I used it in my infant's room after she had been sick and there was NO harsh chemicals or odors to worry about! You just have to be sure to follow the solution -to water amounts listed on the bottle, as opposed to what you may be used to with your traditional cleaning solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We had our carpets cleaned a couple months ago professionally but decided buy our own machine and this cleaner. We are so glad we did! This stuff is great! Carpets are cleaner now than when they did it professionally and I know what my little is playing on! I’ve been slowly changing over to all of puracy products.
customer_reviews.author: Sampson's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great nontoxic cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned our entire house with about 1/4 of the container left. 2,600 square feet. Smell was pleasant. I am sensitive to artificial scents, this didn’t bother me. No artificial scents in it! Did a good job cleaning too! Nice to have peace of mind knowing there is nothing in it that is toxic also!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Radke

customer_reviews.title: Good and VERY sudsy.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good product with a great smell, and a company with good ethics to boot. My only complaint is that it was much more sudsy than other cleaners, and was therefore not the best product to use with my carpet cleaner (it filled the tank with bubbles and overflowed a bit). I would use it to spot treat, but probably won't use it with my carpet cleaner in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Branson Gill

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: It is very concentrated. It is very foamy. I use it with a Hoover Elite. We have dogs that pee on this reminent. Its OK. I clean the carpet daily or more, sometimes every other day. My house stays neutral smelling. Its smells good in the bottle, but otherwise you can't smell anything. I will use this for now, but will look for something else less foamy. I bought it because it is pet safe. We have 9 dogs!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria5131

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, does not do anything to clean or deodorize
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something pure and that's why I chose this product. I don't like the smell, it does nothing about deodorizing the carpet, and it was way to expensive for nothing. I feel that white vinegar works better than this product and it doesn't cost nearly as much as the outrageous price of this useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S

customer_reviews.title: It works well enough in my carpet cleaning machine, ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough in my carpet cleaning machine, but don't have too high of hopes for actual stains. It does very little to my pet stains. I have a baby and 2 animals crawling around on my floor, so I appreciate this being all natural and synthetic fragrance free.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great for asthma/allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: With asthma and allergies, AND white carpet (shudder), I really needed to find this. Glad I did. I don’t want to pour chemicals into my carpet anyway. It works and the citrus smell fades very quickly. Yes, it’s foamy- use only a teaspoon in a standard carpet cleaning tank. Clean the tank’s filter a time or two. Foaming solved.
customer_reviews.author: azuremountain

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've tried for cat urine!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all the recommended, super chemically, products for cat urine in carpet. Nothing worked! It just masked the smell with an even worse chemically smell. UNTIL THIS! This was recommended on Instagram and i'm so glad i tried it! It's been the only thing to not only get rid of the smell, but actually remove pet stains. I also love that it's natural and better for you and your home! Because of it's super strong concentration, this bottle is going to last me forever!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Matz

customer_reviews.title: Not for deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I would not consider this a good choice for “deep cleaning.” I tried cleaning a rug with it that had a pretty intense smell, and it honestly didn’t do much of anything (I cleaned it 2x). Then I used it on the inside of my car and it turned out to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, good for regular cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Seems to get the carpets pretty clean, although not a miracle worker. Good for regular maintenance. And I feel safe letting my animals walk on the rugs right away, as compared to that chemical stuff that smells like wet dog.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Best rug cleaner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I recently cleaned everything in my house due to developed allergies. I decided to go with an all natural product to not cause another reaction. I was sure that although it would work well, I was amazed at how well it actually worked. It too all the stains out and my carpets and upholstery look almost brand new!!! I did pretreat stains, but again I used this and voila.... no more stains. Another wonderful thing about this is that the scent is fresh and not overpowering. No chemical or flowery over odor here!!! love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: HKent

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't remove the stain as well, have to use a bit more.
customer_reviews.text: It is an all natural product, leaves some residue. doesn't bleach your carpet, but doesn't get the stain out. It does however leave a smell than harsher products, just doesn't work as well. I would rather use it & use a bit more than use a more harsh product though & I do like it better & recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OKdokie

customer_reviews.title: It cleans!:)
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the look for a carpet cleaner that cleans well,goes well with my bissel carpet cleaner,smells well and well..it is chemical free!This one is my winner,even though is a bit pricier then the rest I've tried,considering the bottle is small.It has a citrusy smell,cleans pretty well and does not polute the house with unnecessary chemical residue on our carpet.i wish they offer a bigger bottle iption and price deal,so I can stuck up on it:)
customer_reviews.author: vesi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions of the correct amount to use, it didn’t work! So I added a bit more and it still didn’t work for a stain our puppy made on the carpet. I even spot treated and the spot and urine sent was still very much noticeable. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rohrbach

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cleaning product I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaning product I have ever used. I use it in my rug shampooer and it makes my plush carpet soo soft and smelling fresh. I will use it for all my cleaning needs. Great job in formulating this product!!
customer_reviews.author: jackie a.

customer_reviews.title: Carpet cleaner review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this carpet cleaner a few weeks ago. I tried it in my carpet cleaner and it didn’t really work as well as I hoped for. Also the scent is ok but not great. Not very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa and Gary

customer_reviews.title: better than any other product I have used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product primarily because it was not tested on animals. It cleans really well. We were amazed how much dirt it pulled out on the first pass (using a full size carpet cleaning machine). It has a low odor which is important. Just a slight lemony smell which is pleasant. I would definitely try other products in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Krieg

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose
customer_reviews.text: I like that’s it’s more natural than other carpet cleaners. It cleans stains very good and I love that it’s highly concentrated. I ran out of puracy all purpose cleaner and I just added some of this and water and I use it to clean counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Animal and kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my carpet super well. On,the foamy side. But I put water in first and then,add the cleaner,seems to work better that way. I'm just happy to had found something pet and kid friendly,as my cat licks her feet.
customer_reviews.author: lisa a scarbro

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and a good value for the price. It really does clean as it says and with the amount of water you have to dilute it with, it will last me a very very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not thorough
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work thoroughly.I used it to clean stains on the carpet and a few weeks later they came back. Its hard work removing carpet stains this wasted my time and efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Great work, smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smelling carpet cleaner I have ever used. It doesn’t smell like gross chemicals like others I have used. And the carpet looks (for here) better than it has since I moved in.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but not really unscented
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have severe allergies and bought this because it was listed as unscented. It does have a very faint citrus scent. It is not offensive or strong, and it did not affect my allergies or asthma like the store bought carpet detergents do. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Thoughly cleaned a pet disaster
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Thoughly cleaned a pet disaster. Eliminated both odor and stains in a large area of wall to wall carpet. Highly recommended. Results were beyond what I had hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Worry Free Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this Product! I did not notice, when I purchased this item, that it was a citrus smell. After cleaning my carpets and couches, you could not smell the citrus. My carpets are very clean and soft! I just recently purchased a house, so it's a mystery to when the last time the carpets were cleaned. According to the water, it's been a while. This product did an amazing job:) I would recommend this product, and worry free as there are no chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wright

customer_reviews.title: Dilute More than recommended for machines!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome and doesn't leave a weird smell but be careful using too much in a machine. I had to dilute it much more than the bottle recommended to avoid massive bubbles and soapyness.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Henry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I LOVE the brand. I have 2 dogs ( one a puppy) and 4 kids. Keeping furniture, rugs and carpets clean and odor free is difficult. This is one of the few products that doesn't allow the dog sent to linger. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Little.08

customer_reviews.title: Really works with NO smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! And with NO smell. My husband has a severe fragrance allergy. This not only picks up stains from carpet, and leaves the room removed of the bad odors, it leaves NO new odors. Highly endorse this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: The first of MANY products I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Puracy brand. I purchased this product from Amazon have since signed up for repeat delivery through the Puracy website. I have tried nearly every product and love them all. Would reccommed to anyone looking for a great company with equally great products!
customer_reviews.author: Whywechop10

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I have used a lot of carpet cleaners ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have used a lot of carpet cleaners trying to find one that cleans well with a ton of chemicals and awful smells. I see this in a carpet machine we rented and it worked great. Then I mixed it up with water in a spray bottle for regular use. We used it recently on orange throw up on white carpet and it came out completely. (and that is after it had sat in the carpet through the night.) Best carpet cleaner there is!
customer_reviews.author: Erik and Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a house and had to do the cleaning from the previous tenant... the carpets were disgusting since he said he hadn't vacuumed in a long time. This stuff made a huge difference. He came to pick stuff up and was shocked at how clean the carpets were.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Waddington

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This works as well as the harsher chemicals that came with my rug doctor. It has a nice smell without being overly chemical. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Lemony Effective Carpet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my Kirby. Lemon smell instead of lavender makes my home cheerful. Gets out stains (at least better than most products.) I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: PammieLynne

customer_reviews.title: urine stains
customer_reviews.text: This product got out the urine in my carpet. I live in an old home with old carpet with a rescue basset that can't control herself very well. Needless to say, gross. This product surprised me in the best way possible. I am very careful of products so they don't harm my pets (natural going home cleaners, etc). It really pulled the stains from the carpet. I usually do the peed on areas twice but this time I was feeling lazy and only did the carpet once and it still came out! Pretty pumped. Sticking with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Have used inside my bissell steam cleaner left a nice scent in air as I was cleaning and got rid of dirt and also used in spots on chair from my toddlers hands worked great
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it right away so far so good. Update: used it on a year old stain from a plate of food that dropped, after 3 scrubs the stain is gone! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Psalerno

customer_reviews.title: Great safe product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have a dog, a toddler, and an infant. So, not only is it important for me to have a product that works, it's important for me to have a product that is safe. I used this to clean our carpet, and it worked wonders! It smells nice and clean too, not too strong and not Chemical smelling at all!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: A Little Goes A Long Way
customer_reviews.text: This will last you a lifetime! We use it in our bissel carpet cleaner and it is very concentrated. It works great, gets out all of the stains and we love that it is non-toxic and not full of chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stojanovski

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have three pets that are hard on my wall to wall carpet. Very happy with this product. Gets the stains out easily and I feel good about the green nature of Puracy.
customer_reviews.author: Mukti and Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Home based Daycare so I really don't want the babies breathing in nasty chemicals but I also want the rugs to be really clean for them. This makes my rugs nice and clean and with no fragrance or harsh chemicals! It's a Win-Win!
customer_reviews.author: Julie E.

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner.!!
customer_reviews.text: Puracy Natural works great on my carpet!! It has a very light refreshing scent!! So if you are sick of those smelly carpet cleaners that seem hard to get rid of those long lasting deodorants you absolutely have to try this.!!! You will not be disappointed!! It's natural and not harmful to children or pets.!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, cleans great and pet safe!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner! I use it in my carpet cleaner and it works great. It’s definitely very concentrated so be careful. The scent is not over powering and I’m so thankful this won’t make my pets sick!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the smell of carpet cleaner solutions. Sense I have a grandson and dogs I always worry about the chemicals. Even though this is shampoo I just add less. It gets all the stains out first try and my carpet looks new. Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Traut

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned well smelled fresh
customer_reviews.text: It smelled really fresh without being overpowering and cleaned well. My only critique would be that it was super foamy and I had to stop cleaning for a few minutes to wait for the foam to dissipate
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Requires rinsing
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner has to be rinsed. Double work to clean the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Stuffus

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I own a very large detailing business although the product may seem a little expensive it's highly dilutable and it works very very well I'm very pleased with the natural plant-based enzymes that make up your products they seem to work better than anything I've seen on the market or tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works very nice on our carpet. We have 2 Pomeranians that sometimes have an accident on the carpet and this product took it right out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T. DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Sofa looks new again.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned our sofa with Puracy Natural Carpet and Upholstery cleaner. Used the Rug Doctor portable machine and the stains were lifted right out. Didn’t need to use very much of the cleaner and it’ll probably last quite awhile. Love these Puracy products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good smell, no cleaning power.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much cleaning power here. It doesn't lift any stains even if you pretreat. This is alright for the sent but they tell you to dilute it not because it's too strong but because it will bubble too much and shut your carpet cleaner off prematurely.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: It works taking out even the old stains
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stain remover. I had some old stains on my carpet. Sprayed the stain remover on the stain. brushed it in and let it sit for about 12 hours and used my shampooer and the stain disappeared. very good value for the money. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Plotner

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever and do a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I'm so impressed. I had stains that I just could not get out that were there before we even moved into our rental, and this got those stains out. So little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Heisirys

customer_reviews.title: no harsh smell
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product for deep cleaning carpets! It doesnt leave the harsh chemical smell that other products do. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Effective product
customer_reviews.text: I shampooed the carpet in my newborn's room. Smelled of pee, now smells great. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sr23

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I previously used bissell cleaner, but it never cleaned my carpet like this cleaner. It takes longer due to rinsing the carpet, but total worth it! Having 3 dogs this is a must, plus cruelty free!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, goes a long way, annihilated some dog vomit.
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, goes a long way, did my entire living room floor with it! Definitely have to rinse more than once. I did 2 capfuls for a 100oz tank and even then I still had a bit of a gummy feel after rinsing the carpet, which was no big deal. Pulled a lot of nasties out of the carpets and effectively vanquished the dog puke on my sofa. Thanks puracy!
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not working Cleaned spot where my dog made a no no and it smelled worst then before I cleaned
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Only thing so far that I've found that dowsnt irritate my daughters eczema. Will order again. Will have to check out other products from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Used it to spot clean a pet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Used it to spot clean a pet stain on a shag carpet. It removed the stain easily and was not harsh on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like wood polish. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Not very citrus smelling. Kind of pricey for the amount of cleaning solution. Was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: You will never use another cleaning product for the carpet. Gets every stain. I use it in my machine. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. Just used it in my Bissell Green machine. It cleaned fantastically well with no overpowering and sickening smell like most cleaners. Looks like it will last me quite awhile, too.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works on stains that have gone through the dryer. Bought a bottle for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Snead

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo worked really well in our carpet cleaner even got a wine stain out. I researched all natural cleaners for a while before deciding on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fine on matts
customer_reviews.text: I used it on entry indoor/outdoor Matt’s and it’s fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: but once you dilute it smells great. If your priority is to clean
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned and extracted an entire living room with it? The smell when you first open the bottle is NOT really pleasant, but once you dilute it smells great. If your priority is to clean, not use chemicals, and deodorize... This is a POWERFUL way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Leopard

customer_reviews.title: Works so much better than the Rug Doctor brand and is all natural ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than the Rug Doctor brand and is all natural with low foaming!! I will NEVER use another brand for those stingy stains in my carpets. I use the whole line of Puracy cleaners and body wash!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! I use it in my carpet steam cleaner. Smells great and works well! I love that it lasts so long, as it’s concentrated.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Adios, smoothie stain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get a days-old dairy-based spill out of textured sofa fabric... and it worked great! One treatment did the job and the fabric looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed, the product did not produce any noticeable difference in my rug. Should’ve saved the elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie ._c-

product_meta.title: Puracy Professional Carpet Cleaner Machine Detergent, 4X Pet Stain Remover & Deodorizer, 25 Ounce
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL RESULTS: Concentrated, naturally-derived detergents and deodorizers rapidly remove stains, soil, and odors from carpets, rugs, upholstery, and other washable surfaces; advanced natural cleaning technology leaves fibers feeling as soft as new

USE WITH CARPET MACHINE OR BY HAND: Plant-powered, low foam formula quickly loosens soil and stains from surfaces; Safe to use in all major brand carpet machines when diluted per bottle directions (Bissell, Hoover, Rug Doctor, and more)

SAFE FOR YOUR CHILDREN & PETS: Use on any washable surface your family comes in contact with; NO HARSH CHEMICALS: No sulfates, phosphates, animal by-products, chlorine, bleach, dyes, petrochemicals, caustics, perfumes, or optical brighteners
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Natural, non-toxic, hypoallergenic, vegan, gluten-free, biodegradable; Certified Cruelty-Free - Never Tested on Animals; Made in the USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars866 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
